channel.description: Recent content in Feature on Perplex Example

item.title: Concept
item.description: A coherent site structure for different publishing formats, a typographic layout for enhanced Markdown content, and good legibility on all screen sizes are the essential goals of this theme.

item.title: Features
item.description: A page layout based on classic typographical principles without compromise.

item.title: Coming Features
item.description: Features, which I consider essential, and the ones which would be nice to have.
